name: Solitaire Full Deck for FREE
description:
Solitaire by MangoKing Studios the #1 Solitaire card game on the iPhone!
***Top rated Solitaire in multiple countries!***

Solitaire Full Deck Free is a laid back card game to relax at home or on the go.

Play the classic game you love.
If you like Windows Solitaire, you're going to love this app

Popular features of Solitaire include:
- Unlimited free games
- Easy to play and a lot of fun. Recommended for everyone
- Personal stats
- Hints
- Draw 1 card
- Draw 3 cards
- Portrait
- Landscape
- Custom card backs
- Custom backgrounds
- Right or left handed play
- Game state saved when interrupted
- Great fun and addictive
- Terrific game - so enjoyable and easy to play
- Once you start playing it is hard to stop
